entry.title: [MINUTES] Dev Meeting 2017-07-10
entry.summary: Recently, some Pull Requests (PRs) have finally been merged. Although this is not groundbreaking news, it is still a noteworthy update for the concerned parties involved. The PRs that got merged can be found in the provided link to the document shared by Rusty. It is unclear what the PRs were specifically about and who was involved in the process.Regardless of the lack of details, it is always good news when progress is made and tasks are completed successfully. Rusty's use of the word "finally" suggests that the merging of these PRs had been anticipated for some time. This could mean that there were potential roadblocks or delays that were overcome in order to get them merged. Overall, while the information provided is brief, it is a positive update and shows that progress is being made within the project.
